content: I just found #67176, is this still up to date/relevant to polymorphization? cc @oli
since the linked issue (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/46477) isn't closed yet, I'd say it's still up to date
what I am interested in is if #69749 will close this, as afaik that PR only works during codegen
ah, likely not, but maybe we can start using the same infrastructure for detecting polymorphic MIR to deduplicate at the const eval level
